title: Hoover® FloorMate® SpinScrub® with Bonus Hard Floor Wipes
description: Hoover® FloorMate® SpinScrub® with Bonus Hard Floor Wipes

asset.title: Hoover® FloorMate® SpinScrub® with Bonus Hard Floor Wipes
asset.author: Hoover

transcripts: So my home is definitely designed around my family that's why I have lots of hard floors and though I've tried lots of different cleaners I've even tried scrubbing on my hands and knees they just simply push the dirty water around this is the amazing Hoover FloorMate it vacuums washes and dries all at the turn of a dial it's twin tank keep dirty water separate from theme water while expensive are brushes gently scrub your floors leaving deep down dirt no place to hide and it drives really fast and just look how much dirt the floormate picks up I can't believe that was on my support the Hoover FloorMate it's the perfect cleaner for my hard floors, Barney! I really love it.
